overview: Aya, 10 years old, has just suddenly lost the love of her life: her older brother. She tries to survive by clinging to what she can: her older brother's group of friends with whom she shares the pain of mourning and who remind her of the one she has lost. "Okht Elmarhoum" is a closed-door film that takes place in the bedroom of the deceased, the day after his death, where sadness, solidarity and tenderness are shared between 7 young men and a little girl.
title: Okht Elmarhoum
